meanings.definition: The act of paying court to a woman; solicitation of woman's love.
meanings.sent1: During their courtships, the young man brought flowers to impress the woman.
meanings.sent2: Traditional courtships often involve romantic gestures like writing love letters.
meanings.sent3: The courtships in movies always seem so perfect and full of grand gestures.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, negotiations can sometimes feel like delicate courtships.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of courtships lies in the sweet anticipation of mutual affection.
